features.title: Facilitator Dashboard
features.description: The Facilitator Dashboard is where you manage learners, lessons, scheduling, and account-level facilitator tools.
features.howToUse: Open the facilitator area and use the Learners and Lessons sections to manage your work. Mr. Mentor can also open key overlays for you.

features.title: Goals Clipboard
features.description: The Goals clipboard is the UI where you view and edit Goals and Notes for the selected learner (or facilitator).
features.howToUse: Click the 'Goals' button to open it. Mr. Mentor can also help you review what’s saved (report) or suggest what to write (describe/advice).

features.title: Lessons Overlay
features.description: The Lessons overlay is a quick way to browse, search, and act on lessons (schedule, assign/approve, edit, or review).
features.howToUse: Click the 'Lessons' button, or ask Mr. Mentor to show lessons and help you find the one you want.

features.title: Calendar Overlay
features.description: The Calendar overlay shows scheduled items on a calendar and supports planning and review.
features.howToUse: Click the 'Calendar' button. You can also ask Mr. Mentor to show upcoming scheduled lessons.

features.title: Lesson Planner
features.description: The Lesson Planner helps you generate a longer-term plan (often weeks or months) for a learner.
features.howToUse: Ask Mr. Mentor to open the lesson planner and generate a plan starting on a given date for a duration.

features.title: Curriculum Preferences
features.description: Curriculum preferences are learner-specific guardrails used during planning and lesson generation (topics to focus on and topics to avoid).
features.howToUse: Ask 'show my curriculum preferences' to see what’s saved for the selected learner. Tell Mr. Mentor focus/avoid topics to update them.

features.title: Weekly Pattern
features.description: Weekly pattern is a reusable weekly subject template for a learner (e.g., Math on Mon/Wed/Fri).
features.howToUse: Ask 'show my weekly pattern' to report what’s saved for the selected learner. Tell Mr. Mentor subjects by day to update it.

features.title: Custom Subjects
features.description: Custom subjects let you add your own subject names for planning and scheduling.
features.howToUse: Ask 'show my custom subjects' to list them, or say 'add custom subject <name>'.

features.title: No-School Dates
features.description: No-school dates mark days the learner won’t do school so planning can avoid them.
features.howToUse: Ask 'show no-school dates' to report what’s saved for the selected learner.

features.title: Medals
features.description: Medals summarize a learner’s best performance on lessons.
features.howToUse: Ask 'show medals' for the selected learner.
